snippet.title: World Table Tennis Champs (best free to play ping pong game)
snippet.description:
Introducing the most fun, intuitive, and exciting ping pong game you'll ever play on a mobile or tablet... World Table Tennis Champs!

A table tennis game with super slick animations, controls and physics that will thrill your senses. Challenge your limits as you unlock fantastic arenas and visually stunning ping pong tables. Play by the rules of the table tennis and climb up the leader boards to success, loot and glory! Customize your table tennis racket to suit your play style.

The surprise smash hit ping pong ball game that will leave you wondering, fuming, cheering and gasping... do you really have the chops to handle it?


Get it on Google Play: http://bit.ly/WorldTableTennisChamps
Download on the App Store: http://bit.ly/World_Table_Tennis_Champs

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WorldTTChamps
Tweet & Follow: https://twitter.com/WorldTTchamps
Brought to you by: Nextwave Multimedia (The creators of WCC2 - World Cricket Championship 2)

#ping pong #table tennis #ping pong table #ping pong ball #table tennis game #table tennis rules #rules of table tennis #ping pong game #ping pong rules #table tennis racket #nextwave multimedia
